Debugging

Source: vignettes/debugging.Rmd
debugging.Rmd

Choosing a Debugging Technique

  1. traceback(m = 1)
  2. options(error = recover)
  3. debug({package-function})
  4. oor_debug$flag({object-method})

Developed by Steve Walker, Weiguang Guan, Jen Freeman, Ben Bolker, Darren Flynn-Primrose.
